parameters.name: UseLocation
parameters.description: True to define the position of the coordinate system using numerical values, false to not

parameters.name: DeltaX
parameters.description: Distance in meters along the x-axis of the global coordinate system; valid only if UseLocation is true

parameters.name: DeltaY
parameters.description: Distance in meters along the y-axis of the global coordinate system; valid only if UseLocation is true

parameters.name: DeltaZ
parameters.description: Distance in meters along the z-axis of the global coordinate system; valid only if UseLocation is true

parameters.name: UseRotation
parameters.description: True to define the orientation of the coordinate system using numerical values, false to not

parameters.name: AngleX
parameters.description: 0 <= Rotation in radians from the x-axis of the global coordinate system <= 6.283 radians; valid only if UseRotation is true

parameters.name: AngleY
parameters.description: 0 <= Rotation in radians from the y-axis of the global coordinate system <= 6.283 radians; valid only if UseRotation is true

parameters.name: AngleZ
parameters.description: 0 <= Rotation in radians from the z-axis of the global coordinate system <= 6.283 radians; valid only if UseRotation is true

title: IFeatureManager.CreateCoordinateSystemUsingNumericalValues
description: Creates a coordinate system feature using the specified numerical values for position and orientation with respect to the global coordinate system.
signature:
Feature CreateCoordinateSystemUsingNumericalValues( 
   System.Boolean
UseLocation
,
   System.Double
DeltaX
,
   System.Double
DeltaY
,
   System.Double
DeltaZ
,
   System.Boolean
UseRotation
,
   System.Double
AngleX
,
   System.Double
AngleY
,
   System.Double
AngleZ
)

parameters.name: UseLocation
parameters.description: True to define the position of the coordinate system using numerical values, false to not

parameters.name: DeltaX
parameters.description: Distance in meters along the x-axis of the global coordinate system; valid only if UseLocation is true

parameters.name: DeltaY
parameters.description: Distance in meters along the y-axis of the global coordinate system; valid only if UseLocation is true

parameters.name: DeltaZ
parameters.description: Distance in meters along the z-axis of the global coordinate system; valid only if UseLocation is true

parameters.name: UseRotation
parameters.description: True to define the orientation of the coordinate system using numerical values, false to not

parameters.name: AngleX
parameters.description: 0 <= Rotation in radians from the x-axis of the global coordinate system <= 6.283 radians; valid only if UseRotation is true

parameters.name: AngleY
parameters.description: 0 <= Rotation in radians from the y-axis of the global coordinate system <= 6.283 radians; valid only if UseRotation is true

parameters.name: AngleZ
parameters.description: 0 <= Rotation in radians from the z-axis of the global coordinate system <= 6.283 radians; valid only if UseRotation is true

remarks: This method is valid only for parts and assemblies.
